tagline: Rigorous property analysis that replaces gut feelings with spreadsheets
pros: Full investment property modeling with multiple scenarios
Tax benefit analysis including depreciation and 1031 exchanges
Opportunity cost framing against alternative investments
Conservative assumptions that protect against downside
cons: Analysis only — no deal sourcing or property management
Conservative bias may undervalue high-growth opportunities
Needs accurate local data to produce useful results

model_recommendations.notes: Template-following, scheduling, tracking, simple Q&A. Lightweight models save cost without sacrificing quality for these structured tasks.
